Doris Bloom (amụrụ n'afọ 1954 nà Vereeniging, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe nà South Africa nké na-etinye ihe osise n'ime ọrụ ya. Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ nà Denmark.
N'afọ 1972, Bloom gàrà Johannesburg College of Art ma mesịa gaa Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts n'afọ 1976
Ọ natala Queen Ingrid's Great Roman Grant, Villiam H
Michaelsen's Grant, na The State Art Council's Grant
Bloom egosiwo ihe ngosi kemgbe 1977. Màkà ihe ngosi, a maara ya màkà ime ihe n'onwe ya yana mmekorita
A makwaara Bloom maka arụmọrụ n'oge ngosi, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-agụnye ya na-eme ihe ngosi n'ihu ọrụ a rụchara, mana ụfọdụ na-agụnyekwa ya ịmepụta ihe osise n'ihu ndị na-ekiri ya
Bloom na-eji ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche màkà ọrụ ya; mmanụ, watercolor, crayon, na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta.
